body: This is a reported bug posted on https://github.com/xianyi/OpenBLAS/issues/1078, and a patch was proposed at https://groups.google.com/forum/#!topic/openblas-dev/YI1of4HODmw, which has been merged to the develop branch of OpenBLAS but not in version 0.2.19. See also https://github.com/xianyi/OpenBLAS/pull/1098.
title: OpenBLAS compilation error with GCC 7 on POWER8
